name: Rachel Francis Mason
pob: Millageville, Georgia, United States of America
pod: Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States
bio:
Rachel Francis Mason was the daughter of Peter Mason (born approx. 1770) and Rachel Francis (born approx. 1775).

Rachel Francis Mason is buried at Fairmount Cemetery in Red Level, Covington County, Alabama.

Rachel lived through the mid-to-late 1800s in rural Alabama. Her family was part of the early settlement communities in the Covington County region, particularly around Red Level. This area was primarily agricultural during her lifetime.

She and Samuel Parker Jr. had several children, including Rachel Frances Parker (1851-1931), who was the mother of Frances Emma Hartley.
